Room.Name: Mud Slope
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the edge of a hill made of mud.
Room.LongDescription: The soft muddy ground beneath your feet sinks under your weight, forcing you to replant your feet every so few seconds or so. Large mounds of mud can be seen at different places on the slope. Often these mounds turn out to be living monsters, and have been revealed to be frighteningly huge frog-like creatures that have dragged themselves onto the slope.
